import React from 'react' class About extends React.Component { render () { return (

About

I am UI Designer/Developer with over 10 years experience in a fast paced digital agency environment. I love to solve problems, whether it be through clever design or clean code. Bringing creative ideas to life is what makes me tick.

Originally trained in Visual Communications, I've since upskilled and now work as a UI designer and digital designer. In my current role I manage my own smaller scale projects and client base, as well as part of a team on larger projects.

I'm currently working through an online full stack development course.

Outside of working life, I love to break away from the screen completely and indulge in knitting, crochet and amateur dressmaking.
